TopicTitle: Clicking doesnt work most of the time in SPH

Articles.Content:
This has been going on for months now and i'm sick of tried of it. If I try to click something it takes about 10-20 clicks to actually work or when I use the editor stuff it let me switch parts. In the VAB 99.9% of the  time clicking works. It might not be a mod because this has lasted for a long time. Mods: Mostly small stuff. Real Plume, planet shine.

Output: https://www.dropbox.com/home?preview=output_log.txt
